name: kong
description: Kong is a scalable, extensible, open source API gateway that sits in front of any RESTful API.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Prerequisites for this service include postgresql and marathon-lb. See https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/kong for more details.
